home.bannerTitle: Learn Trading with Real Results. No Fluff. No Lies.
home.bannerSubTitle1: Forget fake signals and recycled strategies.
home.bannerSubTitle2: Start your journey with a proven system that works — guided by real traders, not marketers.

why.title: Why Most Traders Fail?
why.subTitle2: It’s not because they lack passion.
why.subTitle3: It’s because they’ve been misled — again and again.
why.why1SubTitle: You’re told to follow a so-called winning formula… but it never delivers.
why.why1SubTitle2: You copy the strategy, enter the trade, and still lose.
why.why1SubTitle3: Why? Because markets change — and real understanding beats imitation every time.
why.why2SubTitle: You join the program, but no one’s there to answer your questions.
why.why2SubTitle2: No mentor, no feedback — just empty chat groups and vague video lessons.
why.why2SubTitle3: You’re left to figure things out alone, and it shows in results.
why.why3SubTitle: You watch hours of content but still don’t know how to win trades.
why.why3SubTitle2: You know the terms, the tools, the theories — but not the market.
why.why3SubTitle3: Without real-world application, knowledge becomes a heavy weight, not a weapon.

solutions.title: This Is Where Everything Changes
solutions.subTitle1: You’ve been misled, confused, and stuck for too long.
solutions.subTitle2: Now it’s time to trade with clarity, confidence, and control.
solutions.titleBox1: Break the Cycle. Win for Real.
solutions.subTitle1Box1: No more lies, fake mentors, or useless lessons.
solutions.subTitle2Box1: Just a clear system that actually delivers results.
solutions.subTitle2Box2: This is practical, guided training — with a proven track record.
solutions.titleBox3: The Shift You’ve Been Waiting For
solutions.subTitle2Box3: Start learning in a way that actually changes your outcome.
solutions.subTitle1Box4: Forget luck and guesswork — they never worked anyway.
solutions.subTitle2Box4: You’re getting structure, support, and results — or nothing.

testimonials.title: Proof, Not Promises
testimonials.subTitle: We let our students do the talking — and the results speak for themselves.

cta.title: One honest moment can shatter years of misinformation.

download.title: The Follow-Up is available exclusively on the mobile app.
download.subTitle: When you purchase this plan, you’ll need to download the mobile app to access the Follow-Up section and receive daily guidance from the admin.

free.title: The Free Course That Tells It Like It Is.
free.subTitle2: Just the truth about trading, scams, and the market — as it really is.
free.subTitle3: Deep insights you’ll value whether you’re new or experienced.
free.what1: The fundamentals of trading and types of analysis
free.what2: Stop hunts — and how you're being targeted
free.what3: The halal and haram in trading, explained clearly
free.what4: A breakdown of all fraud and deception tactics
free.what5: The real trader vs. the online fantasy
free.what6: The Ultimate system and focused follow-up

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.testiTitle: Don’t take our word for it.
